author: sina.com.cn
title: 秋日晚霞映西湖 美景如画引人醉|西湖_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
转自：南湖晚报
　　湖畔
　　作者：夏天琦
　　作者自述：傍晚时分，在西湖边闲逛。远处有宝石山、保俶塔，近处有西湖游船、残荷。
　　点评：这幅照片层次分明，岸边的残荷、湖面上的游船和远处的群山宝塔，形成疏密有致的开合变化。

author: TNN
title: Memorial Parks: AMC's Memorial Parks: A Green Tribute in Ahmedabad | Ahmedabad News - Times of India
text: Ahmedabad: The Ahmedabad Municipal Corporation (AMC) has thought of a novel way to immortalize a loved one and add citizens’ personalization to the city’s green spaces. On Thursday, AMC’s standing committee gave the go-ahead for the creation of 'memorial parks’ in the city's Chandkheda and Nikol neighborhoods as a pilot project. Here, residents will be allowed to plant trees of their choice and dedicate them to their loved ones. In Chandkheda, the park will be developed in town planning (TP) scheme 44 near Gayatri Circle, spanning 8,481 sq m. Nikol’s memorial park will be situated in town planning (TP) scheme 123/C near Mewad Party Plot over 3,253sq m. AMC has decided on a deposit of Rs 3,100 for each tree and plaque and those joining the initiative will be responsible for the maintenance of their dedicated space for a period of one year. Elaborating on the initiative, standing committee chairman Devang Dani said, “Planting a tree and installing a plaque creates a lasting tribute, allowing citizens to connect with their loved ones with a growing, living thing. Memorial parks can become gathering places for families and friends to share memories and find support. This year, AMC is planning to establish memorial parks in Chandkheda and Nikol with this innovative approach.\" The other advantage of creating such spaces, Dani said, was that the “park will consist of a wide variety of trees, since it will have what citizens choose to plant.” Dani assured that AMC will take over the long-term maintenance of the trees. “In case a tree dies naturally or due to unforeseen circumstances, we will replace it with the same species and, if possible, of similar height,” he added.We also published the following articles recentlyMy neighbourhood matters: Broken pumps, infested trees, residents demand revival of parksResidents in sectors 99 and 100 of Noida raise complaints about the deteriorating condition of parks and green belts. Issues include damaged water pumps, incomplete footpaths, and insect-infested trees. Authorities assure prompt action to address the concerns.111734299Green crusaders free trees from metal guardsDiscover how Malleswaram residents in Bengaluru are taking action to protect local trees from suffocating metal guards. author: The Frontier Post
title: Cummins leads Australia to series win over Pakistan
text:
MELBOURNE (Agencies) : Pat Cummins finished with 10 wickets in the match as Australia beat Pakistan by 79 runs inside four days in Melbourne to seal a Test series victory.
Captain Cummins took 5-49 as Pakistan were bowled out for 237 in their second innings, chasing 317 for victory.
The match was delicately poised with Pakistan 219-5 before they lost their last five wickets for just 18 runs.
The last four batters all fell for ducks, with Mitchell Starc supporting Cummins with 4-55.
Victory gives Australia an unassailable 2-0 lead in the three-match series, with the final Test starting on 2 January in Sydney.
Australia resumed day four on 187-6 and Alex Carey’s half-century boosted them to a commanding lead, finishing 262 all out with Pakistan seamers Shaheen Afridi and Mir Hamza taking four wickets each.
But the tourists’ chase started poorly with Abdullah Shafique falling for just four in the fifth over, the day after he had dropped Mitchell Marsh – scorer of a match-winning 96 – on 20.
The experience of captain Shan Masood, with 60, and Babar Azam, who scored 41, appeared to have steered Pakistan out of trouble, before Mohammad Rizwan’s 35 and Salman Agha’s half-century put them in a position to chase victory.
But Rizwan’s dismissal by Cummins, who also removed the well-set Masood, sparked a dramatic collapse and Agha found no support from the lower order.
Cummins was named player of the match for his bowling display, which included 5-48 in Pakistan’s first innings, as he finished with match figures of 10-97. It is the second 10-wicket haul of his career.
The series victory caps a remarkable year for the 30-year-old, who led Australia as they retained the Ashes in England in the summer and then won the World Cup in November.

author: Carla Mendoza
title: Nuevo Tarqui: Manta enfrenta problemas de gestión de residuos en los contenedores
text:
En Nuevo Tarqui, Manta, los ocho contenedores de basura amanecieron llenos hasta las 10 de la mañana de ayer, desbordando desechos. Junto a ellos, muebles viejos, como sofás, obstruían el área, causando molestias a comerciantes y transeúntes. Por ejemplo, esta acumulación afecta la imagen y limpieza del sector. Además, refleja una falta de conciencia ciudadana. La gestión de residuos en los depósitos de basura enfrenta serios desafíos.
[Manta. 100 mil dólares para reparar los contenedores soterrados]
Juan Alvarado, comerciante local, expresó su frustración por el mal uso de los contenedores, destinados solo a desechos orgánicos. Muebles, troncos, ramas y escombros son dejados incorrectamente, complicando la recolección. Por lo tanto, urge una mayor educación ambiental entre los ciudadanos. Asimismo, el problema persiste pese a las normativas vigentes. La responsabilidad ciudadana es clave para solucionar esto.
Manta ya cuenta con ordenanza sancionatoria
Héctor Bowen, director del departamento de Higiene, recordó que desde hace dos meses rige una ordenanza municipal en Manta. Esta sanciona con hasta 900 dólares (dos remuneraciones básicas) a quienes depositen residuos indebidos. Sin embargo, la infracción sigue siendo común en Nuevo Tarqui. Líneas de denuncia como el 911 y la aplicación Mantapp están disponibles. La fiscalización busca mejorar la limpieza urbana.
Para aplicar sanciones, los ciudadanos deben presentar fotos o videos como evidencia, según Bowen. Redes sociales del municipio y chats comunitarios también reciben denuncias. En consecuencia, la participación ciudadana es fundamental para hacer cumplir la ordenanza para el uso de los contenedores. Además, se promueve la separación adecuada de residuos. La tecnología facilita la vigilancia y control.
En conclusión, el desborde de basura en Nuevo Tarqui evidencia la necesidad de reforzar la educación ambiental y el cumplimiento de normativas. La colaboración entre ciudadanos y autoridades es esencial para mantener una ciudad limpia. Por ejemplo, el uso responsable de contenedores evitaría sanciones.
